creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: blue-grey jacket with short, rectangular sleeves; darker blue-grey strip forms collar and frontal opening hems of jacket; dyed design using red, off-white, pinkish-red, grey and purple: octagons containing squares filled with liner geometric design; butterfly-shaped fan design formed by long lines with symmetrical curved line borders on either side, containing chevron shapes and two calligraphic characters; designs overlap on back; red rectangle with grey character outlined in white on back below collar; folded and stitched hem at bottom; dark blue inner hem lining on sleeves; white thread stitching along collar/opening hem strip; tsutsugaki technique
title: Short festival coat (matsuri hanten)
